GSD.product_version: versions from v4.13 to before v4.19.267
GSD.description:
ftrace: Fix null pointer dereference in ftrace_add_mod()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.267 by commit b5bfc61f541d3f092b13dedcfe000d86eb8e133c, it was introduced in version v4.13 by commit 673feb9d76ab3eddde7acfd94b206e321cfc90b9. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: ftrace: Fix null pointer dereference in ftrace_add_mod()
